Title: Death in Chains
Plot: Xena must free Hade's sister, Celesta, Death Herself, from King Sisyphus who wants to cheat death by holding her hostage, thus prolonging his life.
Director: Charles Siebert, Babs Greyhosky, Adam Armus, Nora Ka
GuestStars: Kieren Hutchison, Kate Hodge, Ray Henwood, Leslie Wing, Erik Thomson, Chris Graham, Gordon Hatfield, Paul McLaren, Kelly Greene, Beryl Te Wiata, Wayne England, Allan Wilkins
